text: John Gardiner (c. 1525 – 1586) was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Penryn in 1558 and for Dorchester in 1563. He spent time in the Fleet after a property dispute. His brother, William Gardiner, was an MP for Barnstaple. ==References== Category:1525 births Category:1586 deaths Category:Inmates of Fleet Prison Category:English MPs 1558 Category:Members of the Parliament of England for Dorchester Category:English MPs 1563–1567
title: John Gardiner (died 1586)
